#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,x,i,j;
    cin >> n;
    int a[n];
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin >> a[i];
    }
    cin >> x;

    for(i=0;i<n-1;i++){
        for(j=i+1;j<n;j++){
            if(a[i] + a[j] == x){
                cout << "YES" << endl;
                goto stat;
            }
        }
    }
    cout << "NO" << endl;

    stat:
        ;

    return 0;
}
